info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:00AM CDT until July 14 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 400 AM CDT, a cluster of strong to severe thunderstorms was located over Echo, or 14 miles west of Booneville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Mansfield... Magazine... Blue Mountain... Cardiff... Echo... Barber... Union Hill... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Chismville... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... Elm Park... Liberty... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
